page.title: 07View From School Window 1
page.content: It is not a pretty sight, the view from my school. It shows rows of houses, leaning on each other, as though tired. The streets are deserted as if there's a bomb scare. In the distance there's a path which is like a great snake slithering out of the ground. The trees are restless and have an urge to be up. To the right we see a great mass of green rigid branches, mesmerized by something. On the horizon vast armies of bushes are ready to march . The sky is like a blue blanket with bits of stuffing coming out. Every now and then a bird flies by,out of place, against the blueness of the sky. The tall, slender lamposts are like guardians watching over the sleepy houses. The cars are speeding
